verses.verse: O Lord <WH3068> our Lord <WH113>, how excellent <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776>! who have set <WH5414> your glory <WH1935> above the heavens <WH8064>.

Out of the mouth <WH6310> of babes <WH5768> and sucklings <WH3243> have you ordained <WH3245> strength <WH5797> because of your enemies <WH6887>, that you might still <WH7673> the enemy <WH341> and the avenger <WH5358>.
When I consider <WH7200> your heavens <WH8064>, the work <WH4639> of your fingers <WH676>, the moon <WH3394> and the stars <WH3556>, which you have ordained <WH3559>;
What is man <WH582>, that you are mindful <WH2142> of him <WH1121>? and the son of man <WH120>, that you visit him <WH6485>?
For you have made him a little <WH4592> lower <WH2637> than the angels <WH430>, and have crowned <WH5849> him with glory <WH3519> and honor <WH1926>.
You made him to have dominion <WH4910> over the works <WH4639> of your hands <WH3027>; you have put <WH7896> all things under his feet <WH7272>:
All sheep <WH6792> and oxen <WH504>, Yes <WH929>, and the animals of the field <WH7704>;
The bird <WH6833> of the air <WH8064>, and the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220>, and whatever passes through <WH5674> the paths <WH734> of the seas <WH3220>.
O Lord <WH3068> our Lord <WH113>, how excellent <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776>!
